page.title: 07 NORTHAMPTON TOWN F.C.
page.content: In Northampton there is a football ground. Our team is known locally as "the cobblers" and is at present in the fourth division. There is a big stadium (known as the County Ground)where our home town plays cricket as well as football. The Cobblers were promoted into the first division in 1965 and then started dropping back again. They went right down into the fourth division one season after another. The club have had many difficulties and problems not least of all financial, but their new chairman Derek Banks hopes that one day in the not too distant future they will again be promoted into the first division. Their colours are purple and white.
